text: Semion Mogilevich (born 1946) is a Ukrainian criminal. He was born in Kyiv, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union. He has many aliases. He is on charges for a multi-million-dollar fraud deal. He was on the top ten list of fugitives by the FBI. Only 7 fugitives have been removed from the list since 1950. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Fraudsters Category:Living people Category:People from Kyiv Category:Ukrainian criminals
title: Semion Mogilevich
